title: 旧约 - 约伯记(Job) - 第 41 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 约伯记(Job) -- 第 41 章 ( 本篇共有 42 章 )

lineList.en: Canst thou draw out leviathan with an hook? or his tongue with a cord which thou lettest down?
lineList.cn: 你能用鱼钩钓上鳄鱼吗。能用绳子压下它的舌头吗。

lineList.en: Canst thou put an hook into his nose? or bore his jaw through with a thorn?
lineList.cn: 你能用绳索穿它的鼻子吗。能用钩穿它的腮骨吗。

lineList.en: Will he make many supplications unto thee? will he speak soft words unto thee?
lineList.cn: 它岂向你连连恳求，说柔和的话吗。

lineList.en: Will he make a covenant with thee? wilt thou take him for a servant for ever?
lineList.cn: 岂肯与你立约，使你拿它永远作奴仆吗。

lineList.en: Wilt thou play with him as with a bird? or wilt thou bind him for thy maidens?
lineList.cn: 你岂可拿它当雀鸟玩耍吗。岂可为你的幼女将它拴住吗。

lineList.en: Shall the companions make a banquet of him? shall they part him among the merchants?
lineList.cn: 搭夥的渔夫岂可拿它当货物吗。能把它分给商人吗。

lineList.en: Canst thou fill his skin with barbed irons? or his head with fish spears?
lineList.cn: 你能用倒钩枪扎满它的皮，能用鱼叉叉满它的头吗。

lineList.en: Lay thine hand upon him, remember the battle, do no more.
lineList.cn: 你按手在它身上，想与它争战，就不再这样行吧。

lineList.en: Behold, the hope of him is in vain: shall not one be cast down even at the sight of him?
lineList.cn: 人指望捉拿它是徒然的。一见它，岂不丧胆吗。

lineList.en: None is so fierce that dare stir him up: who then is able to stand before me?
lineList.cn: 没有那吗凶猛的人敢惹它。这样，谁能在我面前删立得住呢。

lineList.en: Who hath prevented me, that I should repay him? whatsoever is under the whole heaven is mine.
lineList.cn: 谁先给我什么，使我偿还呢。天下万物都是我的。

lineList.en: I will not conceal his parts, nor his power, nor his comely proportion.
lineList.cn: 论到鳄鱼的肢体和其大力，并美好的骨骼，我不能缄默不言。

lineList.en: Who can discover the face of his garment? or who can come to him with his double bridle?
lineList.cn: 谁能剥它的外衣。谁能进它上下牙骨之间呢。

lineList.en: Who can open the doors of his face? his teeth are terrible round about.
lineList.cn: 谁能开它的腮颊。它牙齿四围是可畏的。

lineList.en: His scales are his pride, shut up together as with a close seal.
lineList.cn: 它以坚固的鳞甲为可夸，紧紧合闭，封得严密。

lineList.en: One is so near to another, that no air can come between them.
lineList.cn: 这鳞甲一一相连，甚至气不得透入其间，

lineList.en: They are joined one to another, they stick together, that they cannot be sundered.
lineList.cn: 都是互相联络，胶结，不能分离。

lineList.en: By his neesings a light doth shine, and his eyes are like the eyelids of the morning.
lineList.cn: 它打喷嚏就发出光来。它眼睛好像早晨的光线（原文作眼皮）。

lineList.en: Out of his mouth go burning lamps, and sparks of fire leap out.
lineList.cn: 从它口中发出烧着的火把，与飞迸的火星。

lineList.en: Out of his nostrils goeth smoke, as out of a seething pot or caldron.
lineList.cn: 从它鼻孔冒出烟来，如烧开的锅和点着的芦苇。

lineList.en: His breath kindleth coals, and a flame goeth out of his mouth.
lineList.cn: 它的气点着煤炭，有火焰从它口中发出。

lineList.en: In his neck remaineth strength, and sorrow is turned into joy before him.
lineList.cn: 它颈项中存着劲力。在它面前的都恐吓蹦跳。

lineList.en: The flakes of his flesh are joined together: they are firm in themselves; they cannot be moved.
lineList.cn: 它的肉块互相联络，紧贴其身，不能摇动。

lineList.en: His heart is as firm as a stone; yea, as hard as a piece of the nether millstone.
lineList.cn: 它的心结实如石头，如下磨石那样结实。

lineList.en: When he raiseth up himself, the mighty are afraid: by reason of breakings they purify themselves.
lineList.cn: 它一起来，勇士都惊恐，心里慌乱，便都昏迷。

lineList.en: The sword of him that layeth at him cannot hold: the spear, the dart, nor the habergeon.
lineList.cn: 人若用刀，用枪，用标枪，用尖枪扎它，都是无用。

lineList.en: He esteemeth iron as straw, and brass as rotten wood.
lineList.cn: 它以铁为乾草，以铜为烂木。

lineList.en: The arrow cannot make him flee: slingstones are turned with him into stubble.
lineList.cn: 箭不能恐吓它使它逃避。弹石在它看为碎秸。

lineList.en: Darts are counted as stubble: he laugheth at the shaking of a spear.
lineList.cn: 棍棒算为禾秸。它嗤笑短枪飕的响声。

lineList.en: Sharp stones are under him: he spreadeth sharp pointed things upon the mire.
lineList.cn: 它肚腹下如尖瓦片，它如钉耙经过淤泥。

lineList.en: He maketh the deep to boil like a pot: he maketh the sea like a pot of ointment.
lineList.cn: 它使深渊开滚如锅，使洋海如锅中的膏油。

lineList.en: He maketh a path to shine after him; one would think the deep to be hoary.
lineList.cn: 它行的路随后发光，令人想深渊如同白发。

lineList.en: Upon earth there is not his like, who is made without fear.
lineList.cn: 在地上没有像它造的那样，无所惧怕。

lineList.en: He beholdeth all high things: he is a king over all the children of pride.
lineList.cn: 凡高大的，它无不藐视。它在骄傲的水族上作王。
